dcterms:creator: J. Cibulka
dcterms:description: The pancake sorting domain involves sorting a disordered stack of pancakes using a spatula that can flip pancakes above a chosen point in the stack.
dcterms:title: Pancake Sorting Domain

dcterms:creator: Q. Yang
K. Wu
Y. Jiang
dcterms:description: STRIPS action models are used to represent actions in automated planning, where actions are defined by their preconditions and effects.
dcterms:title: STRIPS Action Models

dcterms:creator: S. Wolfram
dcterms:description: Cellular automata are mathematical models consisting of a grid of cells that evolve through simple rules based on the states of neighboring cells.
dcterms:title: Cellular Automata

dcterms:creator: G. Francés
M. Ramirez
dcterms:description: The Tarski AI Planning Modeling Framework is a tool for modeling and solving planning problems in AI.
dcterms:title: Tarski AI Planning Modeling Framework

dcterms:creator: S. Richter
M. Westphal
M. Helmert
dcterms:description: The LAMA Planning System is a tool used in automated planning competitions, known for its efficiency in generating plans.
dcterms:title: LAMA Planning System

dcterms:creator: S. Jiménez
J. Segovia-Aguas
A. Jonsson
dcterms:description: Generalized planning refers to the process of creating plans that can be applied to a variety of situations, rather than being tailored to a specific instance.
dcterms:title: Generalized Planning

dcterms:creator: D. Aineto
S. Jiménez Celorrio
E. Onaindia
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on learning action models with minimal observability, which is crucial for effective planning in uncertain environments.
dcterms:title: Learning Action Models with Minimal Observability

dcterms:creator: E. Amir
A. Chang
dcterms:description: This dataset involves learning partially observable deterministic action models, which are essential for planning in environments where not all information is available.
dcterms:title: Learning Partially Observable Deterministic Action Models

dcterms:creator: M. Asai
C. Muise
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on learning neural-symbolic descriptive planning models, which combine neural networks with symbolic reasoning for planning tasks.
dcterms:title: Learning Neural-Symbolic Descriptive Planning Models

dcterms:creator: D. Aineto
S. Jiménez
E. Onaindia
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive framework for learning declarative action models, which are essential for effective planning.
dcterms:title: Learning Action Models from Plan Examples
